response: Yes it is compatible with black ops 2 and pretty much any call of duty game. You don't have to program anything you just turn the mods on and enjoy all mods.

context: Do these completely cancel out all noise?
response: No, they are very uncomfortable for long hours of gaming as well.

context: Is it Chinese subtitle or English?
response: My son, Joe states the copy he has is only English.

context: Does this work with the XBOX 360 core? And does it actually improve performance?
response: Core is non-slim?  Then yes it will work.  It is quieter than stock but will still get loud during game play.

context: I have never played any games in the Atelier series, does this game provide tutorials for newcomers to the alchemy system?

context: Did you have any problems with the downloads?My old CD would stop downloading and will tell me to retry again because a specific file will this happen

Also I've always purchased the game not download it.Well if your having problems with downloading the game the best thing to do is to contact customer support.

context: How do these headphones connect to the Xbox360 controller?
response: Yes, you plug one part of a mic control into your Xbox and then plug the included 2.5mm cable into your controller.

context: I have a late model 1 sega genesis.  Will this cable work?  The RF connector in the pic doesn't look as though it will fit my system.  Thanks!
response: If all else fails, look underneath your console for the model number. It should be Model# 1601. If it's anything else, then this won't work for you.

context: I just downloaded sims 3 Island paradise but I cannot run it because it says I need to download Sims 3 first. Does any one know if this is the case?
response: You have to have sims 3 before you download any expansion packs.

context: I have ATH-M50, is it okay to buy this or stay with M50? Thanks.
response: If you're using them for gaming. I would say yes, the mic quality is very good in this headset. The highs and lows are also supreme for knowing where the enemy is or just the ambiance

context: Would this work for the PS4?
response: Absolutely, the mix amp pro that comes with it has multiple inputs, you would go straight out of the ps4 optical output into the mix amp pro and the mix amp would send the signal to the headphones, crisp and clear.

context: Does this Razer Taipan have Dual Sensor (two holes, one optical, one laser in the bottom)?
response: I have the BF4 edition of the Taipan, which means mine has a fancy paint job. There are two sensors and there is no LED light for an optical sensor, so I'm gonna say there are two laser sensors, but no optical.

context: what is the battery life for this product?
response: I would say I get a good 10-15 hours of runtime on a single charge, and standby time is also pretty good, charges up pretty fast also!

context: Is the entire "expansion" really just one additional Act V?
response: They added Act V as well as adventure mode where you travel to the various areas and do "bounties." There are also rifts that you can open where the goal is to kill monsters until the rift guardian spawns and you kill that. All for loot.

context: Does the headset require Microsoft's stereo headset adapter that's $25?
response: It is included with any Xbox One headset purchase.

context: Is an internet connection required to play this, and is it an open non-linear playing field? I have Skyrim GOTY and FalloutIII GOTY, love them both.

context: Is there a version of this wheel to avoid?  I heard some of the earlier batches had problems.
response: The people having problems didnt take the time to update to the newest and correct firmware. Even the one I ordered had issues when I first tried it. After the update and applying the correct in game settings, everything worked perfectly and continues to this day. I hope this helps.

context: Will this still work without a CD Drive?

context: is it compatible with rocksmith guitar game for PS3 ?
response: Hi!  No, because Rocksmith converts the analog signals from an electric guitar with its special cable, and this guitar is basically sending a MIDI (digital) signal.  I hope that helps... I know I wanted to do the same, but ended up buying a nice Acoustic/Electric (Ovation) for Rocksmith.

context: what games are on it
response: Hi and Happy Holidays!  There are a ton of games.  The regulars like sudoku, backgammon, checkers, chess, chinese checkers, battle ship, tile games, lots of word games, dominos, etc.  Just look at the list.  What makes it a lot of fun is the avatars that talk and make comments.
